title: ON24 Named '"HOT in 2015"' Winner in San Francisco
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/23/2015 @ 2:00 PM   ON24 
SAN FRANCISCO, Oct. 23, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- ON24, the global leader in webinar-based marketing and demand generation solutions, has been named an Owler HOT in 2015 winner in San Francisco. Owler, the world's leading online source for free competitive intelligence, with over 12 million company profiles in its database, awards the hottest companies in each city using data and analytics it collects from the Owler community. 
http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnvar/20131016/SF98451LOGO-b 
With a run rate of 50,000 webinars in 2015, ON24's platform is designed for demand generation, lead qualification and customer engagement. ON24 was recognized this year by Forrester Research as the best webcasting technology for marketers and serves leading companies including Box, Workday, JPMorgan Chase, and SAP. 
"Marketers increasingly recognize webinars as a necessity for demand generation and virtually all aspects of pipeline creation and the B2B sales funnel," said Joe Hyland, Chief Marketing Officer at ON24. "As the leader in webinar-based marketing, our platform generates billions in sales pipeline for many of the world's leading companies. We're pleased to see the increased attention ON24 is receiving for our market-leading platform, exemplified with Owler's recognition of our visibility within the marketplace." 
Owler's HOT in 2015 winners were selected using several different metrics, including data collected from the Owler community and company profile views. Based on these data points, ON24 is ranked as one of the most popular and trending company profiles in San Francisco. 
"The Owler community is vital in helping us choose the hottest companies around the world," said Brett Miller, Director of Marketing at Owler. "Every ([anonymous]) contribution adds to a company's HOTness score and helps us determine winners in each industry." 
About ON24, Inc. 
ON24 is the leading webinar marketing platform for demand generation, lead qualification and customer engagement. Its award-winning, patented, cloud-based platform enables companies of all sizes to deliver engaging live and on-demand webinars. Providing industry-leading analytics that can be integrated with all leading marketing automation and CRM platforms, ON24 enables marketers to optimize demand generation, enhance lead qualification and accelerate sales pipeline opportunities. 
Additional applications for the ON24 product portfolio include virtual training, talent development and town hall meetings. More than 1,200 enterprises rely on ON24, including IBM, CA Technologies, Merck, JPMorgan Chase, Deloitte, Credit Suisse and SAP. The company is headquartered in San Francisco, with offices throughout the world. For more information, visit http://www.on24.com . 
About Owler Owler is a free competitive intelligence tool that delivers customized insights on competitors, customers, and partners to over 100,000 business professionals. Owler was founded in 2011 by Jim Fowler, who previously founded Jigsaw (acquired by Salesforce in 2010).
